top_comments.comment: This is a reason why you couldn't pay me to live on an island. You're trapped & you're screwed if something like this happens.
Oh no a lava bomb ! 💭I just love it when I get that pop up saying "Someone has liked your comment" or "Someone has subscribed!"😍 It makes somebody's day better! 🌍.

comments_since_last_sample.body: Nature is still stronger than us and you can clearly see it here

This is a reason why you couldn't pay me to live on an island. You're trapped & you're screwed if something like this happens.
